  {# templates/base.html - Footer Snippet #}
    <footer class="site-footer mt-auto">
        <div class="container">
        {% now "Y" as current_year %}
        <p class="footer-text">
            {% blocktranslate %}Muslim Game Classification © {{ current_year }}.{% endblocktranslate %}
            {# --- ADD LINK HERE --- #}
            <a href="{% url 'ratings:methodology' %}" class="text-secondary ms-2 footer-link">{% translate "Rating Methodology" %}</a>
        </p>
        </div>
    </footer>

  <!-- Bootstrap Bundle JS -->
  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.3/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js" integrity="sha384-YvpcrYf0tY3lHB60NNkmXc5s9fDVZLESaAA55NDzOxhy9GkcIdslK1eN7N6jIeHz" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>

   {% block extra_js %}
   {% endblock %}

   <script>
      const themeToggleBtn = document.getElementById('theme-toggle');
      const currentTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme') ? localStorage.getItem('theme') : null;
      const prefersDark = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)');
      const toggleIcon = themeToggleBtn.querySelector('.material-symbols-outlined');

      // Function to apply theme
      function applyTheme(theme) {
          if (theme === 'light') {
              document.body.classList.add('light-mode');
              toggleIcon.textContent = 'dark_mode'; // Show moon icon for light mode
              localStorage.setItem('theme', 'light');
          } else {
              document.body.classList.remove('light-mode');
              toggleIcon.textContent = 'light_mode'; // Show sun icon for dark mode
              localStorage.setItem('theme', 'dark');
          }
      }

      // Initialize theme based on preference or storage
      if (currentTheme) {
          applyTheme(currentTheme);
      } else if (prefersDark.matches) {
          applyTheme('dark'); // Default to dark if user prefers it and no storage set
      } else {
          applyTheme('dark'); // Default to dark otherwise
      }

      // Button click listener
      themeToggleBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
          let newTheme = document.body.classList.contains('light-mode') ? 'dark' : 'light';
          applyTheme(newTheme);
      });

      // Listen for changes in OS preference
      prefersDark.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
          // Only change if no explicit choice was made via button (localStorage)
          if (!localStorage.getItem('theme')) {
              applyTheme(e.matches ? 'dark' : 'light');
          }
      });
	  
	      // --- START: Language Toggle Script ---
    const languageToggleBtn = document.getElementById('language-toggle');
    const languageToggleText = document.getElementById('language-toggle-text');
    // **** CRITICAL LINE: Ensure this template tag is exactly like this ****
    const currentLangCode = "{{ LANGUAGE_CODE }}";
    // **** END CRITICAL LINE ****

    // --- Check if the value is correct in the console (for debugging) ---
    console.log("Current Language Code from Template:", currentLangCode);
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------

    // Set initial button state
    if (currentLangCode === 'ar') {
        languageToggleText.textContent = 'EN'; // Show EN if current is Arabic
        languageToggleBtn.title = "{% translate 'Switch to English' %}";
    } else {
        languageToggleText.textContent = 'ع'; // Show Ayn if current is English (or other)
        languageToggleBtn.title = "{% translate 'Switch to Arabic' %}";
    }

    // Add click listener
    languageToggleBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
        let targetLangCode = '';
        let targetFormId = '';

        if (currentLangCode === 'ar') {
            targetLangCode = 'en';
            targetFormId = 'lang-form-en';
        } else {
            targetLangCode = 'ar';
            targetFormId = 'lang-form-ar';
        }

        const langForm = document.getElementById(targetFormId);
        if (langForm) {
            // Update the 'next' input just before submitting to ensure it's current
            const nextInput = langForm.querySelector('input[name="next"]');
             if (nextInput) {
                  nextInput.value = window.location.pathname + window.location.search;
             }
            langForm.submit();
        } else {
            console.error("Could not find language form:", targetFormId); // Add error logging
        }
    });
    // --- END: Language Toggle Script ---

  </script>

</body>
</html>

=== FILE: C:\Job\MGC\templates\homepage.html ===

{# templates/homepage.html - UPDATED #}
{% extends "base.html" %}
{% load static %}
{% load i18n %}

{% block title %}{% translate "MGC - Muslim Game Classification" %}{% endblock %}

{% block content %}

  {# Pre-translate Rating Tiers for the Cards #}
  {% get_current_language as LANGUAGE_CODE_CURRENT %}
  {% translate "Haram" as translated_haram %}
  {% translate "Mashbouh" as translated_mashbouh %}
  {% translate "Halal" as translated_halal %}
  {% translate "Kufr" as translated_kufr %}

  {# --- 1. Hero Section --- #}
  <div class="homepage-hero text-center py-5 mb-5">
      <h1 class="display-4 fw-bold">{% translate "Muslim Game Classification" %}</h1>
      <p class="lead col-lg-8 mx-auto text-secondary">
          {% translate "Navigating video games according to the Quran & Sunnah as understood by As-Salaf. Find ratings and guidance." %}
      </p>
      <div class="d-grid gap-2 d-sm-flex justify-content-sm-center mt-4">
          <a href="{% url 'ratings:game_list' %}" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg px-4 gap-3">{% translate "Browse Game Ratings" %}</a>
          <a href="{% url 'articles:article_list' %}" class="btn btn-outline-secondary btn-lg px-4">{% translate "Read Articles" %}</a>
      </div>
  </div>

  {# --- 2. What is MGC Section --- #}
  <section id="what-is-mgc" class="py-5 text-center bg-element rounded mb-5">
    <div class="container">
        <h2 class="section-title mb-4">{% translate "What is MGC?" %}</h2>
        {# UPDATED DESCRIPTION #}
        <p class="lead text-secondary col-lg-8 mx-auto">
            {% blocktranslate %}The Muslim Game Classification (MGC) provides guidance for video games based on the Quran, Sunnah, and understanding of the Salaf-us-Salih. We analyze game content across detailed categories (like Aqidah, Immorality, Violence), assess severity levels considering direct actions and normalization, assign an overall ruling (Halal, Mashbouh, Haram, Kufr), and offer suitability notes to help Muslims make informed choices.{% endblocktranslate %}
        </p>
        {# ADDED Link to Methodology #}
        <a href="{% url 'ratings:methodology' %}" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-info mt-3">{% translate "View Full Rating Methodology" %}</a>
    </div>
  </section>

  {# --- 3. Featured Halal Games Section --- #}
  <section id="featured-halal" class="py-5">
    <div class="container">
        <h2 class="section-title text-center mb-4">{% translate "Featured Halal Games" %}</h2>
        <div class="row row-cols-1 row-cols-md-2 row-cols-lg-3 g-4 justify-content-center">
            {% if top_halal_games %}
                {% for game in top_halal_games %}
                   <div class="col">
                       {# Pass translated tiers to snippet #}
                       {% include 'ratings/includes/game_card_snippet.html' with game=game translated_haram=translated_haram translated_mashbouh=translated_mashbouh translated_halal=translated_halal translated_kufr=translated_kufr %}
                   </div>
                {% endfor %}
            {% else %}
               <p class="col-12 text-center text-secondary">{% translate "No Halal games featured yet." %}</p>
            {% endif %}
       </div>
       {% if top_halal_games %}
       <div class="text-center mt-4">
            <a href="{% url 'ratings:game_list' %}?tier=HAL" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary">{% translate "View All Halal Rated Games" %}</a>
        </div>
        {% endif %}
    </div>
  </section>

  {# --- 4. Recent Articles / Insights Section --- #}
  <section id="recent-articles" class="py-5 bg-element rounded mt-5 mb-5">
    <div class="container">
        <h2 class="section-title text-center mb-4">{% translate "Recent Articles & Insights" %}</h2>
        {% if latest_articles %}
            <div class="list-group list-group-flush article-list-simple">
              {% for article in latest_articles %}
                  <a href="{{ article.get_absolute_url }}" class="list-group-item list-group-item-action bg-transparent article-summary-simple">
                      <div class="d-flex w-100 justify-content-between">
                        <h5 class="mb-1 article-summary-title">{{ article.title }}</h5>
                        <small class="text-secondary">{{ article.published_date|date:"M d" }}</small>
                      </div>
                      <p class="mb-1 text-secondary article-summary-excerpt">{{ article.content|striptags|truncatewords:20 }}</p>
                      {% if article.author_name %}
                        <small class="text-tertiary">{% blocktranslate %}By {{ article.author_name }}{% endblocktranslate %}</small>
                      {% endif %}
                  </a>
               {% endfor %}
            </div>
             <div class="text-center mt-4">
                  <a href="{% url 'articles:article_list' %}" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary">{% translate "View All Articles" %}</a>
              </div>
        {% else %}
            <p class="text-center text-secondary">{% translate "No articles published yet." %}</p>
        {% endif %}
    </div>
  </section>

{% endblock %}

{# templates/registration/signup.html #}
{% extends "base.html" %}

{% block title %}Sign Up{% endblock %}

{% block content %}
<div class="row justify-content-center">
    <div class="col-md-8 col-lg-6">
        <div class="card bg-element">
            <div class="card-body p-4">
                <h2 class="text-center mb-4">Sign Up</h2>

                 {# Display non-field errors (if any) #}
                 {% if form.non_field_errors %}
                     <div class="alert alert-danger" role="alert">
                         {% for error in form.non_field_errors %}
                           <p class="mb-0">{{ error }}</p>
                         {% endfor %}
                     </div>
                 {% endif %}

                 {# Display messages from views.py (success/error) #}
                 {% if messages %}
                    {% for message in messages %}
                        <div class="alert {% if message.tags %}alert-{{ message.tags }}{% else %}alert-info{% endif %}" role="alert">
                            {{ message }}
                        </div>
                    {% endfor %}
                 {% endif %}


                <form method="post" action="{% url 'signup' %}"> {# Point action to the signup URL name #}
                    {% csrf_token %}

                    {# Render each field with its label and errors #}
                    {% for field in form %}
                        <div class="mb-3">
                            <label for="{{ field.id_for_label }}" class="form-label">{{ field.label }}</label>
                            {# Add form-control class to the input widget #}
                            {{ field.as_widget|attr:"class:form-control" }}
                            {# Display help text if exists #}
                            {% if field.help_text %}
                                <div class="form-text text-secondary">{{ field.help_text|safe }}</div>
                            {% endif %}
                            {# Display field-specific errors #}
                            {% if field.errors %}
                                <div class="invalid-feedback d-block"> {# Force display #}
                                    {% for error in field.errors %}
                                        <span>{{ error }}</span>
                                    {% endfor %}
                                </div>
                            {% endif %}
                        </div>
                    {% endfor %}

                    <div class="d-grid mt-4">
                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary filter-apply-btn">Sign Up</button>
                    </div>
                </form>

                 <p class="text-center mt-3 small">
                    Already have an account? <a href="{% url 'login' %}" class="text-secondary">Login</a>
                </p>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
{% endblock %}

{% include "includes/attr_filter.html" %}
{% endblock %}

=== FILE: C:\Job\MGC\manage.py ===

#!/usr/bin/env python
"""Django's command-line utility for administrative tasks."""
import os
import sys


def main():
    """Run administrative tasks."""
    os.environ.setdefault('DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE', 'mgc_project.settings')
    try:
        from django.core.management import execute_from_command_line
    except ImportError as exc:
        raise ImportError(
            "Couldn't import Django. Are you sure it's installed and "
            "available on your PYTHONPATH environment variable? Did you "
            "forget to activate a virtual environment?"
        ) from exc
    execute_from_command_line(sys.argv)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
